channel.title: BackGround Problem
channel.description:
I've just downloaded Quarantinezone Client & Source, but I don't know how to change the background of the client.
Well, I extract it, then I get into the folder. Then I can see a folder called 'cache', I click on it, after that I click on 'Files', then 'Spirts', then I can't see the background file to change... So, the problem is, I can't find the background to edit...

item.title: BackGround Problem
item.dc:creator: @Jack3 Jack-
item.description:
@Jack3 wrote:

I’ve just downloaded Quarantinezone Client & Source, but I don’t know how to change the background of the client.

Well, I extract it, then I get into the folder. Then I can see a folder called ‘cache’, I click on it, after that I click on ‘Files’, then ‘Spirts’, then I can’t see the background file to change… So, the problem is, I can’t find the background to edit…

Read full topic
